# AUDIO::PLAY_VEHICLE_DOOR_CLOSE_SOUND

## Summary
Trigger a door close sound

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** veh
* **INT** door

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
doorId: see SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_SHUT
